1.text: Check the care label to confirm the shirt is machine-washable.

2.text: Divide the white and colored shirts to prevent staining.

3.text: Separate shirts made of silk, wool, cashmere, or other delicate materials.

4.text: Unbutton all the buttons on the shirt.
4.vid: /a/a9/Wash Dress Shirts in the Washing Machine Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Pretreat any stains on the shirt.
5.vid: /c/ca/Wash Dress Shirts in the Washing Machine Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Turn the shirt inside out before washing it.
6.vid: /3/39/Wash Dress Shirts in the Washing Machine Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Set the machine to cold water.

8.text: Load your normal detergent before putting the shirt in.
8.vid: /0/00/Wash Dress Shirts in the Washing Machine Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Place delicate shirts in a washer bag to prevent them from tearing.
9.vid: /5/5c/Wash Dress Shirts in the Washing Machine Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Run the machine on the normal cycle for standard dress shirts.

11.text: Set the machine to delicate for fragile materials.

12.text: Shake the shirt out immediately after you remove it.
12.vid: /7/74/Wash Dress Shirts in the Washing Machine Step 12.360p.mp4

13.vid: /1/1f/Wash Dress Shirts in the Washing Machine Step 13.360p.mp4

14.vid: /f/fa/Wash Dress Shirts in the Washing Machine Step 14.360p.mp4

15.text: Hang the shirt on a plastic hanger to dry.
